title: Are there neuroscience topics taught in high school? If yes, what are they? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not much about it in high school but we did the basics. The different lobes in the brain and their main functions, gray matter vs. white matter, basics on central nervous system (cerebellum, spinal cord, reflexes), a bit of psychology (Pavlov and Phineas Gage) . That’s pretty much the extent of it for high school.
